name: BattleBox
description:
BattleBox is a simple game where you match symbols on cards to symbols on the board to activate the card's abilities! Collect unique cards and try new combinations!  This is my first game, made in Godot, and I'm proud of how it turned out. Download is free or by donation.

If you have any issues or questions about the game, or want to be on the high score leaderboard, contact me at josepht44256@gmail.com
